attributes.action: Abolish road tax and incorporate into fuel cost
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Negate the possibility of people not paying road taxes by abolishing the Road Tax and instead incorporating the charge onto the cost of fuel itself.
Also, that way the more you drive, the more fuel you buy and also the more road tax you pay!!
Also the money saved in administering the Road Tax system could then be used in some other more useful way.

It seems so logical - does it not?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
